attributes.action: Bring back the death penalty for sex offenders and child rapists
attributes.additional_details: To protect children of all ages and so that this is decreased throughout of the UK. Our justice system is too lenient on offenders and it’s time to stand up and stop this kind of evil.
attributes.background: To have a national vote to bring it back, it’s time to let the people of the UK have a voice.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554914
